title: AXISCADES subsidiary wins ₹100 crore defence radar contract
description: The operates in aerospace, defence, electronics, semiconductor and artificial intelligence sectors, said the deal positions Mistral as a key player in India’s defence electronics indigenisation efforts
content:
AXISCADES Technologies Limited announced today that its subsidiary Mistral Solutions has secured a ₹100 crore contract from India’s LLTR Ashwini programme, an indigenous low-level transportable radar system developed by DRDO and BEL.

title: Davos 2026: AI not just about creating content, it can predict road crashes too
description: Artificial Intelligence is set to revolutionize road safety. SaveLife Foundation is using AI for predictive analysis to prevent road crashes. The Indian government is also pushing for AI integration in road safety initiatives. AI-trained cameras are already identifying hazards like parked vehicles and intersection conflicts. This technology promises faster insights and can transform lives by making mobility safer for everyone.
content:

title: Want to learn AI and robotics for free? Check out SWAYAM courses
description: The Ministry of Education–run SWAYAM platform has opened fresh registrations for a wide range of free online courses. Learners can enrol from January 19 in subjects spanning animation, artificial intelligence, coding, robotics and cloud computing.
content:
The Study Webs of Active-Learning for Young Aspiring Minds (SWAYAM) will begin fresh registrations for its free online courses from January 19.
An initiative of the Ministry of Education, the platform allows students, working professionals and lifelo... [4126 chars]

title: AI Revolution: Predicting Road Safety with Technology
description: Artificial Intelligence is transforming road safety by predicting crashes. Piyush Tewari of SaveLife Foundation emphasizes AI's role in proactive road safety measures. The Indian government supports AI initiatives for quicker data interpretation. AI-trained cameras and drones are used to prevent collisions and identify road conflicts.
content:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is stepping beyond digital realms, promising transformative impacts in real-world road safety by predicting crashes before they occur.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Revolution: Predicting Road Safety with Technology
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Why attending the ET AI Awards matters for AI leaders
description: The ET AI Awards are not designed as a social gathering or a networking spectacle. For attendees, they represent a deliberate strategic choice to gain clarity on how artificial intelligence is being evaluated, deployed, and scaled across enterprises. Attending the ET AI Awards to sharpen decision-making, benchmark maturity, and stay aligned with where AI leadership is truly heading.

title: Anthropic warns AI may widen rich-poor gap as it opens first India office
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is supposed to make our lives easier. Tech companies have shown us this promise for years now, but who will actually benefit from AI? Anthropic’s new report suggests that low-income countries are at risk of falling behind, which could widen the gap between the rich and the poor.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Reshaping Global Markets and Opening India’s Next Growth Frontier
description: Artificial intelligence is reshaping global equity markets, led by dominant US technology firms. As valuation concerns rise, India is emerging as a major AI infrastructure growth hub, supported by policy backing, talent depth and rising data centre investments.
